contact_points.description: On the handle of the drawer
contact_points.usage: Primary grasp point for opening the drawer. Approach along the local Z-axis (red arrow) to secure the grip on the handle. Once held, apply linear pulling force along the Y-axis.

functional_points.description: Reference point for drawer opening orientation
functional_points.usage: Linear interaction indicator. Explicitly defines that the drawer must be pulled along the local Y-axis (blue arrow) to be extracted from the cabinet. The exact spatial position is used for vector alignment.
